description: PloneLanguageTool allows you to set the available languages in your Plone site, select various fallback mechanisms, and control the use of flags for language selection and translations.

info.Keywords:: Zope CMF Plone i18n l10n flags
info.Package Index Owner:: davisagli, hannosch, optilude, wichert, esteele, evilbungle, laurencerowe

longdescription: PloneLanguageTool allows you to set the available languages in your Plone site, select various fallback mechanisms, and control the use of flags for language selection and translations.
